casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Teddy Jabar HARGETT 102P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Michele Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Hargett, Teddy Jabar. Robert Devane Croom, IV, Assistant Attorney General, Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of June 2017 by Defendant to Supplement Motion to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review and Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
